entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text: After a party-goer in Seoul tested positive for #covid19 South Korea did more than 65,000 tests, uncovering 170 infections. It looks like that may have stopped the outbreak. Hope it has! Shows amazing value of aggressive contact tracing and testing https://t.co/dyihDcSYWx
